reviewText: they need to put this movie in dvd.

This is a great movie, if you are looking for a good 50's era flick.  There are plenty of great car chase scenes (mercs, fords, chevys, & an awesome lincoln) and a few good songs to boot. An all around good movie.
One of the best movies ever.  Such an exciting ending, plus 55 to 57 Chevys to die for.
Such a great car movie! The cars look right, move right, and sound right! open up those headers boys and run some shine! The Lincoln is definately the star floating down a back highway at 100+.
To whom this concern do you think you will every get this movie I dvd
The movies is an old classic in my opinion. Not giving five stars just because I ordered this thinking it was a DVD but that's my fault. Both are pretty much dead technologies anyway.
We love this movie our daughter got our other one and we wanted another one so I went to amazon and found another one thanks

This is absolutely one of the best moonshine runner movies since Thunder Alley with Robert Mitchum. A newer one is Lawless which was also very good but there was somthing about this one that stands out. It was an HBO movie and I guess thats why nobody has put it out on dvd but if you get a chance to see then do because it is terrific. Great acting and great actors. Nuff said.
Great condition for a Video cassette. Really like the movie :)
The movie was excellent in showing and sound. I would recommend this movie to everyone. I order something else similar to that movie because i loved it so much.
This is an older movie...I loved it when it came out in the theater...love it just the same. And now...I can watch it anytime I want.
I purchased the movie for a friend & he liked it very much & I appreciate the prompt service. I have purchased 2 other items recently & was very satisfied with the service for each purchase
